# farm-base
farm.base is a simple kickstart to any responsive project.


## Getting started

...


### What's in the download?

```
farm-base/
├── package.json
├── README.md
└── source/
    ├── css/
    ├── farm/
    ├─────── farm-base.css
    ├─────── farm-browser.js
    ├─────── farm_icons.js
    ├─────── farm_ini.js
    ├─────── farm-load-others.js
    ├─────── farm_load-require.js
    ├─────── farm_opts.js
    ├── favicon/
    ├── imgs/
    ├── index.html
    ├── js/
    ├─────── home.js
    ├─────── index.js
    ├── package.json
    ├── templates/
    ├─────── browser_alert.js
    └─────── home_page.js

```

## Browser support

- Chrome latest
- Firefox latest
- Opera latest
- Safari latest
- IE latest

The above list is non-exhaustive.
